website_summaries.verdict: Sound construction, but performance doesn't stack up to the Bosch wipers.
pros: Patented Smart Flex technology conforms to windshield curve
Blade cover is designed to prevent dirt & debris buildup
cons: blade-to-wiper contact is poor on some vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Worse wiper ever....do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I buy Michelin wiper and the experience is really bad. After First I did make sure it fits my car, but the way it install will not secure the wiper in position. After a few use, it starts to make noise. But when there is heavy rain, it will be A bit smooth. Now after 4 months of use, now it will keep scrach the windshield in the middle making big noise, and not wipe clear. Check the video!
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Stealth Operation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wipers in order to eliminate noise after using two other leading brands from auto parts stores. These were a little less costs than the others and completely got rid of the annoying rubbing and vibrating sounds. The wipers also do a great job of clearing the windshield of water. Would recommend these to anyone having noise issues with their wipers.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well on a 2004 Accord.
customer_reviews.text: Although it was indicated for my car, it did not lie flush over the entire windshield surface of my 2004 Honda Accord. It left a large patch of water uncleared. I had to send it back for refund and there was a modest restocking fee. I also had to make a cardboard envelope to ship it back in as the plastic bag it came in was cut open in an inopportune place so I could not reuse it for the return.
customer_reviews.author: DocDenis

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wiper is good but not great. I was able to easily install it on my truck, but when the blade reaches the top of the windshield it does stutter a little bit and make some noise. This happens with a high amount of rain/water, not when dry. It isn't enough to return it, but I wish that it had a soft, smooth wipe all the way through. However for the price, this is a decent blade.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they promised
customer_reviews.text: I replaced OEM wipers with this models because in cold rain or snow i had miss pots and lines over the windshield. Michelin advertised this wipers as flawless in such weather condition but they aren't any better than honda OEM wipers. Bosh wipers on my other vehicle are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon says this fits my 2010 Tundra but Michelin decided it was a good idea to not include the plastic hardware required to install this wiper blade. I am on hold with them as I write this review to hopefully get the required plastic hardware. The 24” for my passenger side had the hardware included...why the hell don’t the include it in all lengths?! It actually states in the instructions that the connector arm is only available in certain sizes. Welp, just spoke to someone...7-14 days to receive a connector that should have been in there to begin with...WTF!! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 years of smooth operation in Indiana
customer_reviews.text: I just realized I've had these wipers on my car for 4 years, when I was annoyed I needed to order new wipers because they started streaking a little. Shame on me, i guess. Great value for years of a quiet operation in Indiana weather.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: After putting them on we had a rain storm and the wipers were like squeegees. It made the glass much clearer and ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how well this product worked. Several of the reviews were not kind. After putting them on we had a rain storm and the wipers were like squeegees. It made the glass much clearer and easier to see! thanks for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Beyoni's Books

customer_reviews.title: After taking tha plastic part off the wiper did most better. But not as good as i had hoped
customer_reviews.text: After getting this wiper an install it it didn't clean of touch the center of the windshield. After checking out fount the middle of this wiper has a plastic support that was holding the blade off the glass. After taking tha plastic part off the wiper did most better. But not as good as i had hoped..
customer_reviews.author: David Himeback

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for 07 Accord. Leave a huge area ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for 07 Accord. Leave a huge area untouched in the middle of the windshield. Returned them for a full refund (Great amazon customer service as always). They might work for other cars though!
customer_reviews.author: Jaff

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I like torturing myself because I have put up with these for a year now. I should have returned them but was too lazy at the time. After about a week they started to make a lot of noise if I was using them while going any faster than 25-30 MPH. They seem to wipe the water away just fine but the noise has become unbearable. I can't take it anymore so I'm buying a different brand. I have a 2011 Hyundai Sonata.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ganim

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back to cheap wiper blades
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER spent this much money on a wiper blade before but after having to replace a few cheap $5 blades every few months, I figured I'd take a shot. I'll never go back to cheap blades...the wipe on these is great, easy install and they last a LONG time. I'd certainly recommend the little extra money for this wiper.
customer_reviews.author: Ffej

customer_reviews.title: Top quality Wipers
customer_reviews.text: These are quality wiper blades. Needed to replace wipers on my Cadillac SRX and this was a much cheaper option than the dealer. Very simple to remove old wipers and install these new ones. The are sleek looking and look very solid. Live in FL so it rains a lot and this work great. Comes with different mounting options so just find the right one and installed in 5 minutes. I will be buying these in the future when I need to replace them again.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMan34

customer_reviews.title: After its installation, two weeks ago the plastic assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: After its installation, two weeks ago the plastic assembly was broken and replaced. In addition, the cleaning was not the expected, when it took speed by heavy rain the screech and the black spot did not wait. Not recommendded.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Good but defective.
customer_reviews.text: This wiper blade was great....until it flew off during a rain storm. That's right, completely broke off leaving me with a metal wiper arm scraping across the windshield as I couldn't drive without at least ONE wiper going. Thank God it was on the passenger side. Not sure I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Bananashack

customer_reviews.title: maybe a bad one that I ended up with
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but it doesn't clean my windshield very well. it leaves a large streak, in the middle of the windshield were the blade passes over and doesn't clean. maybe a bad one that I ended up with...
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: Okay but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should be. Just wish the price could be lower. I've discovered goodyear wipers at costco which is the same quality but for a much cheaper price like almost half for the price of two.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin I

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The installation instructions need a bit more clarification. Other than that the wipers work flawlessly: smooth, complete, stable, and very silent. I have had these in the past and the durability is second to none. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: I would have been better leaving the old
customer_reviews.text: I would have been better leaving the old, worn out wiper on my car as it did a better job. The wiper skips the glass and makes noise on every single upswing in heavy rain. Ironically seems to stay flush with the glass in light rain though. And this is the second that I have purchased because the first one flew off in a storm. I would recommend RainX over this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Loud noise.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a loud noise when wiping window. The typical rubber rubbing against glass noise. Loud enough to be heard while driving. My car is corolla 2014. Maybe should have bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Jingyi Gao

customer_reviews.title: the installation piece is low quality
customer_reviews.text: it looks made from high quality materials but they miss the hanging part from this i bought it for my Corolla 2013 and its OK but it won't install properly as the installation piece is low quality
customer_reviews.author: Siraj Eddin

customer_reviews.title: An OK wiper blade.
customer_reviews.text: Its fine. Not the greatest wiper but for the price it does the job. Tends to not last as long as some of the better blades/brands.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: ... you are driving in a light rain but not good at all in a heavy rain storm
customer_reviews.text: These Michelin 8026 stealth wiper blades are okay if you are driving in a light rain but not good at all in a heavy rain storm
customer_reviews.author: Terry J Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Youtube will show how to install
customer_reviews.text: No product should be this hard to install. Had to youtube because directions are ridiculously terrible
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Eagle

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Although the shipping packaging was mangled and open when received the wiper blade was intact . The 14" blade that I purchased was broken out of the package so I had to buy a 14" blade of a different brand(. Duralast)Both the 14" Duralast and the 26" Michelin were on the front windshield wiper blades .Michelin's quality was far superior
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: very squeaky
customer_reviews.text: These are very squeaky when the changing direction on two different vehicles/ windshields. I will not be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Beams
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of trouble with beams applying even pressure on my windshield but these seemed to be the solution. (Lexus Ct200h)
customer_reviews.author: Will Peters

customer_reviews.title: Not a good wiper
customer_reviews.text: The blade fell apart while driving on the highway in a downpour, that was the 2nd time I used the blade. Won’t buy again, had to drive straight to autozone to replace it. It was the passengaer side wiper thank goodness
customer_reviews.author: chrystal audet

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! It does not works at least as an windshild wiper...
customer_reviews.text: Makes much noise, looks like as it is loose and leave large areas with moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Leaves big areas untouched
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for Honda Accord 2007. Leaves big areas untouched and no amount of adjusting would fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Saberi

customer_reviews.title: Sad excuse for windshield wipers
customer_reviews.text: Don't clean a brand new windshield well. Flutter at highway speeds. Streaks every insect.
customer_reviews.author: beverly

customer_reviews.title: not buying again
customer_reviews.text: it has a curved shape so there is a section in my windshield that never gets wiped. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: wizard

customer_reviews.title: Measure both before ordering. Hope they last!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wipers. Be careful both your wipers may not be the same size. Measure their length before ordering them. Very nice wipers.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Great for Q50!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my 2015 Infiniti Q50, would highly recommend it. Much better quality compared to the ones the car comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: 2005 Honda Accord has a pair of plastic alignment flanges ...
customer_reviews.text: 2005 Honda Accord has a pair of plastic alignment flanges on the driver's side wiper arm that are too narrow to fit the large cover on this wiper. Prying them apart allowed this wiper to function correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on '12 Camry. Working much better than my previous blades (unknown brand from previous seller). Happy so far let's see how long they last. Can't beat for $7.
customer_reviews.author: fubag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. I like how clean my windshield is ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I like how clean my windshield is with these new wipers. I will stick with this product on all my cars from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dov Fleischman

customer_reviews.title: I'll stick with the Michelin's
customer_reviews.text: A must have. Especially if your blind like me and change your wipers frequent. Not as often now with these. Great at higher speeds compared to others also noted. Mark R. and the Tech Truth
customer_reviews.author: Mark Reeves and the Tech Truth

customer_reviews.title: Good windshield wiper.
customer_reviews.text: Easy change out. Cleans the windshield and does not make noise.
customer_reviews.author: randybeall

customer_reviews.title: worth it.
customer_reviews.text: for the money these are awesome wipers. I like the rubber cover over the blades, nice clean look
customer_reviews.author: farleyfive

customer_reviews.title: these are easily the quietest and smoothest wiper blades that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: At least when new, these are easily the quietest and smoothest wiper blades that I can remember using. Time will tell of course.
customer_reviews.author: EggRacer

customer_reviews.title: Better value than OEM
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect for the driver side of a 2011 BMW 528 sedan, better value than OEM.
customer_reviews.author: pogi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: These wipe the windshield cleanly without the streaks I saw from my previous wipers.
customer_reviews.author: A Car Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best windshield wiper style there is. Easy to install. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Icon Green

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth at all
customer_reviews.text: These were good for a few days and then started skipping like crazy. Would only be smooth if there was a ton of rain on the windshield.. Going back to my Valeo 900s.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great! Does the job. Does not streak, does not make noise. It was a little hard to figure out how to install, but after watching a video I got it.
customer_reviews.author: larissa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last
customer_reviews.text: For a name brand these only lasted a couple of months. Now the squeak and hop on the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelbaker Family

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet
customer_reviews.text: Really quiet! No more clop-clop-clop when the windshield wipers are turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Not for heated wiper needs
customer_reviews.text: Correct size and easy install on my 2014 Subaru Impreza. Clip to hold it on is plastic, however, so not good if you need to use your wiper heat to melt ice off the wiper. Fine for other times if year or warm climates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my car like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2013 Hyundai Sonata Hybrid like a glove, other brands (Bosch) left a mark on the driver side, but not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jose C

customer_reviews.title: Wiper blade assembly disconnected itself after four months of Florida heat and rain.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair of Michelin Wiper Blade Assemblies in January of this year for my 2014 Honda Accord. During a classic Florida downpour in May of the same year, the 24 inch Blade assembly ejected itself from the J hook arm while I was traveling on a major highway (I also purchased the 19 inch blade assembly, which stayed put). Absolutely unacceptable. Since the entire wiper assembly ejected and is now on the side of the highway, I have no idea what broke loose. I checked the wiper arm, the J hook is in perfect shape. Have replaced WWblade assemblies for years, never had or heard of one coming off the car like this.
customer_reviews.author: dal family

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine for my 2011 Toyota Corolla but not as long ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for my 2011 Toyota Corolla but not as long as other wipers have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not something to use in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Its really bad quality windshield wiper. Very often pulling watter in a middle of the blade across a windshield. Doesn't press rubber to glass at hte ends of the blade, about 1-2 inch on each end.
customer_reviews.author: vit

customer_reviews.title: Swipes like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Swipes like a dream. I bet I could even put jello and pudding on the windshield and wipe it off with no smears.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 423

customer_reviews.title: Wipers are fine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good typical windshield wiper. Very affordable for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Good works great for Civic
customer_reviews.text: Good works great for Civic better than OEM and various other brands I have tried out. Not sure how long these will last.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Sqeaky is hardly stealthy
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing stealthy about this wiper, it only cleans part of the windshield (just enough for the driver to see through) and squeaks on every pass. I have a 2003 Honda Accord, and it says this is the right size. Keep the packaging in case it's just as terrible for you so can return it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: They squeak really badly. It's been 3 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: They squeak really badly. It's been 3 months and has not stopped. I am going back to Bosch at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Ira Hart

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Will definitely purchase this brand for all my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put on when you think you can do it without the instructions, even for a guy, but great wiper blades!
customer_reviews.author: bamamom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am pleased with the effectiveness
customer_reviews.author: McQuadeH

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother's MB E350. They work great. No streaks and no weird noises. Smooth wipers.
customer_reviews.author: waverider

customer_reviews.title: Stealthy clear view
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. My son arrived just in time to help me do it. No streaking. Only clear windshield :0)
customer_reviews.author: paradiddle

customer_reviews.title: Works but not stealth
customer_reviews.text: It works well but not stealth. It is noisy for me about half the time, making a rubber rubbing noise at top of wipe arc.
customer_reviews.author: muldenator

customer_reviews.title: Great value sleekerlook than traditional multi hinge blades.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value wiper blade with non replaceable insert. It's traditional metal with multiple hinges and grip points on the rubber insert. It also has a rubbery cover that shrouds the metal hinges, giving it a sleeker look that should resist icing. It's not a single metal spring ikon style blade, but more economical. We shall see how long the rubber lasts... I still mourn the death of replaceable inserts for blades... Trying to let that one go.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon says that it fits 2005 Accord, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon says that it fits 2005 Accord, but it does not. It is too thick to fit into the viper holder.
customer_reviews.author: rivulet

customer_reviews.title: Good product at great price!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were fairly easy to understand and the wiper blades feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat The Price!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great! Fits my 2010 Nissan Versa Driver Wiper perfectly! Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: I Am A Human

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite the upgrade in wiping power over my last blades, and the installation wasn't too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got 2 of these since it said compatible with ...
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these since it said compatible with my accord but it turns out my accord has one longer and one shorter blade! Ended up just getting the dealership to change them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Manuel

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit like the original
customer_reviews.text: I have a tundra. The adapter causes the blade to stay much higher than the OEM. The end connector doesn't fit nice. It is squeaking at end of the windshield. I regret not buying an Oem blade.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo barreto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best wipers I've ever purchased for my Mercedes. These are the Best
customer_reviews.author: G. Flippin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: on a 2010 Mazda CX7 you need one of these. the driver side takes a 16 inch
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: 1 for 3 on parts needed
customer_reviews.text: After ordering three blades and only one package came with all the parts and the other two missing pieces, I would pass. Luckily my third package had the one and only piece I needed, but was missing the others if thay is what you needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I put these wipers on my wife's Lexus RX and they fell apart! The wiper blade came completely off the frame. Shoddy assembly. Never again
customer_reviews.author: stilrox

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old wipers. They worked great and keep my vision clear when i was driving under rainny day. I will by another one for my rear glass when it needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: B. Xu

customer_reviews.title: Great Wipers
customer_reviews.text: Great wipers. Easy to install, with multiple adapters and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Original DRT

customer_reviews.title: Fit Guide is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the fit confirmation. It indicated that the 26" blades would fit my 2016 Toyota Tundra. They did not and now I am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: RJohn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the wipers died and started producing squeaking sound in less than a month
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Functional but loud
customer_reviews.text: Performs well enough as a wiper, but is super loud! So annoying to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leyan Lo

customer_reviews.title: Streaks after 2 weeks of use on RAV4
customer_reviews.text: Great blades for 2 weeks.Now i have streaks all over the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: WastedMoney

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They wipe clean but it squeaks pretty loud overall it looks good on my windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly labeled wiper, did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Wiper was incorrectly labeled and did not fit my car. Suggest researching your cars fitment to be sure these fit
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lowndes

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: easy to install. just be aware that there is one blade not two per package, so to replace both your windshield wipers you have to buy two
customer_reviews.author: eric brown

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 3 1/2 months before it would start streaking ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 3 1/2 months before it would start streaking and become noisy as if the blades harden up over time..
customer_reviews.author: Andy R

customer_reviews.title: One of the best wipers I've bought
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wipers I've bought. It was a great fit for my Nissan Sentra 2007. Driver side wiper.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The windshield doesn't lay correctly against the window so the middle space doesn't get cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Porsche perfectly and work super well leaving no streaks. Highly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better for a Chevy Sonic
customer_reviews.text: Difficult fit on a 2013 Chevy Sonic. Directions are incorrect - you need to remove the carrier to get the blade to fit, not add it like the directions state. Also, the fit of the blade onto the wiper arm is not as secure as I would like as there is a cover on the front that does not snap down as far as it should to fully secure the blade to the arm.
customer_reviews.author: vettenet

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: These do NOT fit on 2005 Acura TLs. Amazon said it was compatible. Don't trust the suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Stealth is an appropriate name for these. The wiper blade is completely enclosed in a sleek plastic housing. The blades perform better than other aero wipers (e.g. Bosch Icon and Valeo), from what I notice so far. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: John Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Poor contact
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in September expecting them to last through the winter in New England and didn't even make it through December. They look horrible streaks and don't contact the window properly. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It's started making noise and chattering within a month. I've had blades last almost a year before doing this. Maybe Bridgestone needs to start making wiper blades
customer_reviews.author: RamItOne

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this product save your money seriously
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of use these windshield wipers are doing lots of noise and they are not wiping the windshield the way they described it .I'm really disappointed I hope they have warranty on these wipers!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Walid

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product when in use but this was the first ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product when in use but this was the first time using it during rain season, and the wiper snapped off. Installation was done right as it lasted since March, back when I first bought it but during heavy use it didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Beau2017

customer_reviews.title: I waited too long to try them so they have basically become garbage.
customer_reviews.text: These wipers come with 4 pieces that need to be put together. I have tried to put them together and had my brother-in-law, who works on cars, look at the pieces and instructions and neither of us could figure them out. I have always replaced my own windshield wipers and it's never been difficult. Wipers came as one piece and snapped on, but these ones come with 4 pieces and lousy instructions. Unfortunately, I waited too long to try them so they have basically become garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A Halverson

customer_reviews.title: takes know how
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself mechanically smart but had never have had such a bad time putting wipers on a car ever. Took me two hours. Worst directions ever!
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Wiper blade doesn't seem to fit 2004 Honda Accord windshield ...
customer_reviews.text: Wiper blade doesn't seem to fit 2004 Honda Accord windshield. It leaves a big streak on the glass and doesn't wipe part of it. It's also no longer quiet after just a few rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Bryar Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Blades streak and do not clear rain/snow consistently. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: *update: After 3 months of using these blades in the Midwest, I have found these blades are of poor quality. They streak horribly even when clearing rain. Yes, I have cleaned my windshield. The issue lies with the wipers. I should have stuck with OEM replacements. There is no "lock in" mechanism for these wiper blades. Sometimes, the wipers slide down off the J-hook of the wiper arm, though I usually notice the movement and push the wiper back up on the arm before it falls off. *Bought for: 2010 Accord EX-L Sedan:
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: noisy wiper blade
customer_reviews.text: Noisy and not a good fit on the touareg as listed
customer_reviews.author: JC

product_meta.title: Michelin 8026 Stealth Hybrid Windshield Wiper Blade with Smart Flex Design, 26" (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Say goodbye to streaks, smearing, and squeaking with Michelin's new Smart Flex design wiper blades. The special 3-part Flex design has been engineered to hold wiper ends down in the harshest weather conditions.
feature_bullets: Smart Flex technology adapts to windshield curve for best, long-lasting wiper performance in harsh weather
Sleek aerodynamic cover keeps blade from clogging with debris, ice and snow
Independent suspension adjusts to windshield shape for strong contact from end to end of wiper blade
EZ Lok connector system for quick and easy replacement
Independent tests show after 300,000 wipe cycles Michelin Stealth wipers outperform all industry competitors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars223 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
